item.title: CRISPR Identifies Commonly Available Drug That Works as Cobra Venom Antidote - Good News Network
item.description:
1. CRISPR Identifies Commonly Available Drug That Works as Cobra Venom Antidote  Good News Network
  2. Common blood-thinning drug neutralises cobra venom  BBC.com
  3. Common Blood Thinners Could Combat Snakebites, Preventing Tissue Damage and Amputations, Study Finds  Smithsonian Magazine

  5. Scientists Discover New Antidote for Cobra Bites: Heparin  Sci.News
